attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To legalise assisted suicide would completely negate the art of healing and caring.Killing and murder would be the name of the game and doctors and nurses might allow themselves to be persuaded to commit these crimes if  they are not strong enough to stand up for what is right. Society would suffer severely as a long term result. We need to promote a common good not a common evil.
